item.title: Using interfaces in Go
item.description: A lot have changed in the past few months! I’ve started a new job @ CloudCover and have also started contributing to golang projects! The inspiration for this post comes from a (slightly) confusing topic in golang which I initially struggled to understand, and that’s interfaces! This post doesn’t cover what interfaces are! There are lots of really good articles on the internet for that. What I really want to focus on is “how” you can use them and what common pitfalls to avoid (especially if you come from Java / C#)
